jsky.graphics
Interface CanvasFigureListener

All Superinterfaces:
java.util.EventListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
CanvasFigureListenerAdapter
public interface CanvasFigureListener
extends java.util.EventListener

This defines the interface for listening for events on a canvas figure.

Method Summary
 void figureDeselected(CanvasFigureEvent e)
          Invoked when the figure is deselected.
 void figureMoved(CanvasFigureEvent e)
          Invoked when the figure's position changes.
 void figureResized(CanvasFigureEvent e)
          Invoked when the figure's size changes.
 void figureSelected(CanvasFigureEvent e)
          Invoked when the figure is selected.
